member.name: P:ImageTools.ImageProperty.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the value, indicating which kind of information this property stores.
member.value: The name of the property.
member.example: Typical properties are the author, copyright information or other meta information.

member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the property, e.g. the name of the author.

member.name: T:ImageTools.ImageBase
member.summary: Base classes for all Images.

member.name: F:ImageTools.ImageBase.DefaultDelayTime
member.summary: The default animation speed, when the image is animated.

member.name: M:ImageTools.ImageBase.Transform(ImageTools.ImageBase,ImageTools.ImageBase,ImageTools.RotationType,ImageTools.FlippingType)
member.summary: Transforms the specified image by flipping and rotating it. First the image will be rotated, then the image will be flipped. A new image will be returned. The original image will not be changed.
member.param: The image, which should be transformed.
The new transformed image.
Type of the rotation.
Type of the flipping.

member.name: M:ImageTools.ImageBase.FlipX(ImageTools.ImageBase)
member.summary: Swaps the image at the X-axis, which goes throug the middle of the height of the image.
member.param: The image to swap at the x-axis. Cannot be null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: M:ImageTools.ImageBase.FlipY(ImageTools.ImageBase)
member.summary: Swaps the image at the Y-axis, which goes throug the middle of the width of the image.
member.param: The image to swap at the y-axis. Cannot be null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: M:ImageTools.ImageBase.Crop(ImageTools.ImageBase,ImageTools.ImageBase,ImageTools.Rectangle)
member.summary: Cuts the image with the specified rectangle and returns a new image.
member.param: The image, where a cutted copy should be made from.
The new image.
The bounds of the new image.

member.name: M:ImageTools.ImageBase.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the height and the width of the image.
member.param: The width of the image in pixels.
The height of the image in pixels.

exception.para: is equals or less than zero.
is equals or less than zero.

member.name: M:ImageTools.ImageBase.#ctor(ImageTools.ImageBase)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by making a copy from another image.
member.param: The other, where the clone should be made from.

member.name: M:ImageTools.ImageBase.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ImageTools.ImageBase.SetPixels(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sets the pixel array of the image.
member.param: The new width of the image. Must be greater than zero.
The new height of the image. Must be greater than zero.
The array with colors. Must be a multiple of four, width and height.

exception.para: is not a multiple of four, width and height.

member.name: P:ImageTools.ImageBase.DelayTime
member.summary: If not 0, this field specifies the number of hundredths (1/100) of a second to wait before continuing with the processing of the Data Stream. The clock starts ticking immediately after the graphic is rendered. This field may be used in conjunction with the User Input Flag field.

member.name: P:ImageTools.ImageBase.IsFilled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this image has been loaded.
member.value: true if this image has been loaded; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:ImageTools.ImageBase.Pixels
member.summary: Returns all pixels of the image as simple byte array.
member.value: All image pixels as byte array.
member.remarks: The returned array has a length of Width * Length * 4 bytes and stores the red, the green, the blue and the alpha value for each pixel in this order.

member.name: P:ImageTools.ImageBase.PixelHeight
member.summary: Gets the height of this in pixels.
member.value: The height of this image.
member.remarks: The height will be initialized by the constructor or when the data will be pixel data will set.

member.name: P:ImageTools.ImageBase.PixelWidth
member.summary: Gets the width of this in pixels.
member.value: The width of this image.
member.remarks: The width will be initialized by the constructor or when the data will be pixel data will set.

member.name: P:ImageTools.ImageBase.PixelRatio
member.summary: Gets the ratio between the width and the height of this instance.
member.value: The ratio between the width and the height.

member.name: P:ImageTools.ImageBase.Item(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of a pixel at the specified position.
member.param: The x-coordinate of the pixel. Must be greater than zero and smaller than the width of the pixel.
The y-coordinate of the pixel. Must be greater than zero and smaller than the width of the pixel.
member.value: The color of the pixel.

exception.para: is smaller than zero or greater than the width of the image.
is smaller than zero or greater than the height of the image.

member.name: P:ImageTools.ImageBase.Bounds
member.summary: Calculates a new rectangle which represents the dimensions of this image.
member.value: The object, which represents the image dimension.

member.name: T:ImageTools.IImageResizer
member.summary: Interface for all image resizing algorithms.

member.name: M:ImageTools.IImageResizer.Resize(ImageTools.ImageBase,ImageTools.ImageBase,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Resizes the specified source image by creating a new image with the spezified size which is a resized version of the passed image..
member.param: The source image, where the pixel data should be get from.
The resized image.
The width of the new image. Must be greater than zero.
The height of the new image. Must be greater than zero..

member.name: T:ImageTools.FlippingType
member.summary: Defines how a image should be flipped.

member.name: F:ImageTools.FlippingType.None
member.summary: Dont flip the image.

member.name: F:ImageTools.FlippingType.FlipX
member.summary: Flip the image at the x-axis which goes through the middle of the image.

member.name: F:ImageTools.FlippingType.FlipY
member.summary: Flip the image at the y-axis, which goes through the middle of the image.

member.summary: A collection of objects.

member.name: T:ImageTools.IImageFilter
member.summary: Image processing filter interface.
member.remarks: The interface defines the set of methods, which should be provided by all image processing filters. Methods of this interface manipulate the original image.

member.name: M:ImageTools.IImageFilter.Apply(ImageTools.ImageBase,ImageTools.ImageBase,ImageTools.Rectangle)
member.summary: Apply filter to an image at the area of the specified rectangle.
member.param: Target image to apply filter to.
The source image. Cannot be null.
The rectangle, which defines the area of the image where the filter should be applied to.
member.remarks: The method keeps the source image unchanged and returns the the result of image processing filter as new image.

member.name: T:ImageTools.ExtendedImage
member.summary: Image class with stores the pixels and provides common functionality such as loading images from files and streams or operation like resizing or cutting.
member.remarks: The image data is alway stored in RGBA format, where the red, the blue, the alpha values are simple bytes.

member.name: F:ImageTools.ExtendedImage.DefaultDensityX
member.summary: The default density value (dots per inch) in x direction. The default value is 75 dots per inch.

member.name: F:ImageTools.ExtendedImage.DefaultDensityY
member.summary: The default density value (dots per inch) in y direction. The default value is 75 dots per inch.

member.summary: Applies the specified filter to the image.

The filter, which should be applied to.
member.returns: A copy of the image with the applied filter.

The rectangle, where the filter should be applied to.
member.returns: A copy of the image with the applied filter.

member.returns: The new cutted image.

member.name: M:ImageTools.ExtendedImage.SetSource(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Sets the source of the image to a specified stream.
member.param: A that contains the data for this . Cannot be null.
member.remarks: The stream will not be closed or disposed when the loading is finished, so always use a using block or manually dispose the stream, when using the method. The class does not support alpha transparency in bitmaps. To enable alpha transparency, use PNG images with 32 bits per pixel.
member.exception: The image has an invalid format.
The image cannot be loaded because loading images of this type are not supported yet.

member.summary: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
member.returns: A new object that is a copy of this instance.

member.summary: Occurs when the download is completed.

member.name: E:ImageTools.ExtendedImage.DownloadProgress
member.summary: Occurs when the download progress changed.

member.name: E:ImageTools.ExtendedImage.LoadingCompleted
member.summary: Occurs when the loading is completed.

member.name: E:ImageTools.ExtendedImage.LoadingFailed
member.summary: Occurs when the loading of the image failed.

member.name: P:ImageTools.ExtendedImage.IsLoading
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this image is loading at the moment.
member.value: true if this instance is image is loading at the moment; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:ImageTools.ExtendedImage.DensityX
member.summary: Gets or sets the resolution of the image in x direction. It is defined as number of dots per inch and should be an positive value.
member.value: The density of the image in x direction.

member.name: P:ImageTools.ExtendedImage.DensityY
member.summary: Gets or sets the resolution of the image in y direction. It is defined as number of dots per inch and should be an positive value.
member.value: The density of the image in y direction.

member.name: P:ImageTools.ExtendedImage.InchWidth
member.summary: Gets the width of the image in inches. It is calculated as the width of the image in pixels multiplied with the density. When the density is equals or less than zero the default value is used.
member.value: The width of the image in inches.

member.name: P:ImageTools.ExtendedImage.InchHeight
member.summary: Gets the height of the image in inches. It is calculated as the height of the image in pixels multiplied with the density. When the density is equals or less than zero the default value is used.
member.value: The height of the image in inches.

member.name: P:ImageTools.ExtendedImage.IsAnimated
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this image is animated.
member.value: true if this image is animated; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:ImageTools.ExtendedImage.Frames
member.summary: Get the other frames for the animation.
member.value: The list of frame images.

member.name: P:ImageTools.ExtendedImage.Properties
member.summary: Gets the list of properties for storing meta information about this image.
member.value: A list of image properties.

member.name: P:ImageTools.ExtendedImage.UriSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the source of the .
member.value: The source of the . The default value is null (Nothing in Visual Basic).
member.remarks: If the stream source and the uri source are both set, the stream source will be ignored.
